is up and walking

Pictures: Strong holds at Boston benefit concert

Tommy DeCarlo, lead singer of the group Boston, performed at the Boston Strong Concert: An Evening of Support and Celebration at the TD Garden. Bizuayehu Tesfaye/AP
Marathon victim bombing Victoria McGrath (center) was among those who raised their arms on stage before the start of the concert. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Carole King and James Taylor came on stage during the Boston Strong benefit concert. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
James Taylor and Jimmy Buffett performed. together at the Boston Strong benefit at the TD Garden. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Former football player and Natick native Doug Flutie bowed to his fellow former Patriot Tedy Bruschi during the concert. Gretchen Erl/Reuters
Joey McIntyre of New Kids on the Block sang to the crowd Gretchen Ertl/Reuters
Dressed in Boston Bruins' jerseys, The New Kids on the Block, took the stage with Boyz II Men, dressed in Celtics jerseys. Gretchen Ertl/Reuters
A fan listened while Donnie Wahlberg of New Kids on the Block addressed the audience. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Former Patriots star Joe Andruzzi blew a kiss to the crowd from the stage. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Audience members responded with emotion while listening to radio host Matt Siegel. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Country singer Jason Aldean performed Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Hometown favorites the J. Geils Band performed before a packed TD Garden audience. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
Peter Wolf of The J. Geils Band performed. Yoon S. Byun/Globe Staff
